effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

name: Chromebustible Bomb Suit

spells.description:
Use: Rapidly deploy the bomb suit to reduce damage taken by 75% for 20 sec or until 9.6 million damage has been prevented.

Upon depletion, the bomb suit detonates to deal 848,406 Fire damage split between nearby enemies. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

description: When the only options are initial success or total failure.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 398 Strength up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 68,231 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 155,079.
Use: Increase movement speed by 150% and allow you to skim over water, rapidly diminishing over 1 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

item.name: Quel'Zaram, High Blade of the Lion

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Quel'Zaram, High Blade of the Lion

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,117 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.

name: Tabard of the Lightbringer

spells.description: Use: Suffuses the wearer with the Light. (30 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
